segments.text: You've heard of Bruce Jenner , haven't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He won the decathlon in the 1976 Olympics , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I read that he trained so much that he used to dream about jumping hurdles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can think of better things to dream about ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes he would wake up covered in sweat , with his legs pumping away .
segments.speaker: S1
